SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.ItemCode,B.itemName,A.WhsCode,C.BinCode,B.DistNumber,A.OnHandQty,b.CostTotal from OBBQ (nolock) AS A LEFT JOIN OBTN (nolock) AS B ON A.ItemCode = B.ItemCode AND A.SnBMDAbs = B.AbsEntry JOIN OBIN (nolock) AS C ON A.BinAbs = C.AbsEntry WHERE (A.ItemCode like'%'+ISNULL(':1','')+'%') and (B.ItemName like'%'+ISNULL(':2','')+'%') and (A.WhsCode like'%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') and (C.BinCode like'%'+ISNULL(':6','')+'%') and (B.DistNumber like'%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') :5
